detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
Jumper in soft, fine, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Hoodie in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with a high collar, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hoodie in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with a high collar, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and raw, roll-edge hems.
Shorts in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and raw, roll-edge hems.
Long skirt in soft, heavily draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Long skirt in soft, heavily draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Long skirt in soft, heavily draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Fitted T-shirt in soft pima cotton with a round, ribbed neckline, short, wide sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Pile jacket with a large collar, zip down the front, discreet side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Calf-length trousers in a viscose weave with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative bow with tassels at the waist. Side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Zip at the top, two zipped outer compartments and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Depth 5.5 cm. Height 12 cm. Width 23 cm.

Shirt in a silk and cotton weave with a collar and V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist with pleats for added volume at the top, and a gently rounded hem.
Wide blouse in a cotton and silk weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Wide blouse in a cotton and silk weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with cuffs, and short slits in the sides.

Long, straight-cut shirt in an airy, pattern-weave silk and cotton blend. Turn-down collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Chinos in a pima cotton weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Chinos in a pima cotton weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length suit trousers in an airy linen weave with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length suit trousers in an airy linen weave with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Trousers in a crisp pima cotton weave. High waist with a tab and button at the sides, a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets. Wide, tapered legs with an adjustable tab and buttons at the hems.

Wide, ankle-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon made from a silk blend. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top, gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist, a gathered seam at the hips and a wide, voluminous skirt. Detachable, fitted underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Calf-length skirt in a crisp pima cotton weave. Regular waist with a tab and button at the sides, a concealed zip at the back and large patch front pockets with a flap and button. Unlined.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in pima cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Short sleeves, flap chest pockets, flap front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Depth 9.5 cm. Height 14.5 cm. Width 28 cm.

Cap in cotton twill and shoulder bag in a patterned weave. Cap with a fabric appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Bag with a glittery appliqué, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 13x19.5 cm.
Small handbag in woven fabric with a sheen. Short, adjustable shoulder strap with metal eyelets and a large metal buckle. Zip at the top. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 23 cm.

Straight-cut jacket in a crisp pima cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest and front pockets, gently dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in a pima cotton weave with a collar and detachable storm flap at the front. Dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs. Seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist, large patch front pockets and a high single back vent. Unlined.
Set with a cap and sun hat. Cap in cotton twill with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave. Cotton lining.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Bomber jacket in shimmering, patterned satin with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long sleeves and ribbing with a glittery stripe around the collar, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted, straight-style top in soft jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.
Fitted, straight-style top in soft jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.
Top in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and ties at the front of the hem.
Top in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and ties at the front of the hem.
Top in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and ties at the front of the hem.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Adjustable chin strap with a toggle fastener. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with inset lace trims at the front and butterfly sleeves in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Batik-patterned swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Batik-patterned swimsuit in recycled polyester with flounced shoulder straps and a lined gusset.

Batik-patterned surf suit in UV-protective fabric with a stand-up collar, zip with a zip guard at the back and 3/4-length raglan sleeves. Short legs and a lined gusset. UPF50. The polyester content of the surf suit is recycled.

Set with a waistcoat and pair of shorts in a linen and cotton weave, a shirt in cotton poplin and a pre-tied bow tie. Lined waistcoat with buttons at the front and fake front pockets. Knee-length shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket. Shirt with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and a plastic fastener at the back.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather and imitation suede details, a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and imitation suede heel caps.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and imitation suede heel caps.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Set with a headband and pair of wrist warmers in a soft alpaca blend. Headband with a decorative knot at the front.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.

Short, sleeveless dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathered seams at the shoulders and a seam with covered elastication under the bust. Unlined.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a round neckline and contrasting colour fringes on the short sides.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a round neckline and contrasting colour fringes on the short sides.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Large metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 6.5 cm.

Baseball jacket in woven fabric with a terry appliqué on the chest, zip down the front with a chin guard and fake front pockets. Stand-up collar with striped ribbing, and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
